code: import uuid from'uuid/v4';import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from"./types";export var setAlert=function setAlert(msg,alertType){return function(dispatch){var id=uuid();dispatch({type:SET_ALERT,payload:{msg:msg,alertType:alertType,id:id}});setTimeout(function(){return dispatch({type:REMOVE_ALERT,payload:id});},5000);};};
